title: Magical Creatures
description: How well do you know the beasts of the wizarding world?

questions.question: What three-headed dog guards the Philosopher's Stone?
questions.explanation: Fluffy is Hagrid's three-headed dog who can be put to sleep with music!

questions.question: Hippogriffs must be bowed to before you can approach them.
questions.explanation: Hippogriffs are proud creatures - you must bow and wait for them to bow back before approaching!

questions.question: What creature can only be seen by those who have witnessed death?
questions.explanation: Thestrals are skeletal winged horses that are invisible to those who haven't seen death!

questions.question: What is Dumbledore's phoenix named?
questions.explanation: Fawkes is Dumbledore's loyal phoenix who helps Harry in the Chamber of Secrets and can carry immensely heavy loads!

questions.question: A Basilisk can kill with its stare.
questions.explanation: The Basilisk's direct gaze causes instant death, while seeing it indirectly (like through a mirror) causes petrification!

questions.question: What creature is Aragog?
questions.explanation: Aragog is a giant Acromantula who Hagrid raised from an egg and lives in the Forbidden Forest!

questions.question: What do Dementors feed on?
questions.explanation: Dementors drain peace, hope, and happiness from their surroundings. The Dementor's Kiss removes a person's soul entirely!

questions.question: House-elves are freed when given clothes by their master.
questions.explanation: House-elves are bound to serve until given clothes. Harry freed Dobby by tricking Lucius Malfoy into giving Dobby a sock!
